video_title: Sota Watanabe (Startale) - Inside Soneium: The Fastest-Growing Ethereum L2
description: A technical case study of Soneium, the fastest-growing Ethereum L2. Sota covers architecture (rollups, ZK vs optimistic), dev tooling, and enterprise adoption strategies that won trust in a crowded market.
